content:
IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback Interface

Definition

Provides additional functions when a specified workflow command is loaded.

In this Article

public interface IWorkflowCommandExtensionCallback

Methods

OnWorkflowCommandLoaded(CommandInfo)

Provides additional functions based on the specified workflow command to be loaded.

public void OnWorkflowCommandLoaded (System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.CommandInfo commandInfo);
Parameters
commandInfo
CommandInfo

The workflow command to be loaded.
